title: Xirrus Wins a 2015 TMC Communications Solutions Product of the Year Award
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/21/2015 @ 5:25 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Xirrus, Inc. 
THOUSAND OAKS, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 10/21/15 -- Xirrus , the leading provider of high-performance wireless networks, today announced that TMC , a global, integrated media company, has awarded the Xirrus wall mounted access point (AP), XR-320, a 2015 Communications Solutions Product of the Year Award. The award honors exceptional products and services introduced this year that facilitate voice, data and video communications. 
"Congratulations to Xirrus for being honored with a 2015 Communications Solutions Product of the Year Award," said Rich Tehrani , CEO of TMC. "The Xirrus wall mounted AP, XR-320, is truly an innovative product and is amongst the best solutions that facilitate voice, data and video communications brought to market in the past twelve months. I look forward to continued excellence from Xirrus in 2015 and beyond." 
The Xirrus wall mounted AP, XR-320, marked the industry's first cloud-managed, wall-mounted 802.11ac AP, with integrated wired Gigabit switch designed for in-room connectivity. Built to support the latest 802.11ac Wi-Fi standards, the XR-320 is ideal for applications such as streaming video, rich media access, gaming and latency sensitive applications like VoIP. The AP is designed for multi-device wired and wireless connectivity in hotel rooms, dormitories, hospital rooms, offices, and similar locations. Highly versatile with controllable LEDs and paintable surface, The XR-320 is discreet for in-room aesthetics. 
"We are thrilled to receive this recognition from TMC's prestigious award program," said Shane Buckley, CEO of Xirrus. "Xirrus will continue to innovate new Wi-Fi networking products and services for businesses and organizations who need fast, reliable and secure Wi-Fi solutions." 
To learn more about Xirrus' award winning XR-320, please visit: http://www.xirrus.com/product/access-point-xr-320/ .

About Xirrus, Inc. Xirrus is the leading provider of high-performance, extreme density wireless networks. Xirrus solutions perform under the most demanding circumstances, offering consistent "wired-like" performance with superior coverage and security. The Xirrus suite of Wi-Fi optimized solutions -- high density access points, access points, cloud services, and wired switches -- provide seamless connectivity and unified management across the network. Xirrus provides a vital strategic business and IT infrastructure advantage to industries that depend on wireless to operate business-critical applications. With tens of thousands of customer solutions deployed globally, Xirrus maintains operations and partnerships across the globe. Xirrus is a privately held company and is headquartered in Thousand Oaks, CA. For more information please visit: www.xirrus.com and follow us on Twitter: @Xirrus .
